Q2

Class AddAndDFTMutex

  • java.lang.Object
    • Q2.AddAndDFT
      • Q2.AddAndDFTMutex

  • public class AddAndDFTMutex
extends AddAndDFT
    Mutex implementation of the barrier mechanism for AddAndDFT operation.
    Author:
    Yasir

    • Constructor Detail

      • AddAndDFTMutex

        public AddAndDFTMutex(int threadCount,
                      int matrixSize)
        Constructor that creates 2 matrices with given dimension sizes, randomizes them and initializes the result of the operation as an empty matrix
        Parameters:
        threadCount - Number of threads that will be involved in the calculation
        matrixSize - Size of the each dimension of each matrix

    • Method Detail

      • Barrier

        protected void Barrier()
        Barrier mechanism that will be used the by the worker threads. Utilizes a Mutex and two Semaphores to achieve parallelism.
        Specified by:
        Barrier in class AddAndDFT
